   10980           0 :             void print() {
   10981           0 :                 printSourceInfo();
   10982             : 
   10983           0 :                 itMessage = messages.begin();
   10984             : 
   10985           0 :                 switch( result.getResultType() ) {
   10986             :                     case ResultWas::Ok:
   10987           0 :                         printResultType( Colour::ResultSuccess, passedString() );
   10988           0 :                         printOriginalExpression();
   10989           0 :                         printReconstructedExpression();
   10990           0 :                         if ( ! result.hasExpression() )
   10991           0 :                             printRemainingMessages( Colour::None );
   10992             :                         else
   10993           0 :                             printRemainingMessages();
   10994           0 :                         break;
   10995             :                     case ResultWas::ExpressionFailed:
   10996           0 :                         if( result.isOk() )
   10997           0 :                             printResultType( Colour::ResultSuccess, failedString() + std::string( " - but was ok" ) );
   10998             :                         else
   10999           0 :                             printResultType( Colour::Error, failedString() );

   11001           0 :                         printReconstructedExpression();
   11002           0 :                         printRemainingMessages();
   11003           0 :                         break;
   11004             :                     case ResultWas::ThrewException:
   11005           0 :                         printResultType( Colour::Error, failedString() );
   11006           0 :                         printIssue( "unexpected exception with message:" );
   11007           0 :                         printMessage();

   11009           0 :                         printRemainingMessages();
   11010           0 :                         break;

   11017           0 :                         break;
   11018             :                     case ResultWas::DidntThrowException:
   11019           0 :                         printResultType( Colour::Error, failedString() );

   11021           0 :                         printExpressionWas();
   11022           0 :                         printRemainingMessages();

   11038           0 :                         break;

   11069           0 :                         Colour colourGuard( colour );

   11079             : 
   11080           0 :             void printExpressionWas() {
   11081           0 :                 if( result.hasExpression() ) {
   11082           0 :                     stream << ';';
   11083             :                     {
   11084           0 :                         Colour colour( dimColour() );
   11085           0 :                         stream << " expression was:";
   11086             :                     }
   11087           0 :                     printOriginalExpression();
   11088             :                 }
   11089           0 :             }
   11090             : 
   11091           0 :             void printOriginalExpression() const {
   11092           0 :                 if( result.hasExpression() ) {
   11093           0 :                     stream << ' ' << result.getExpression();
   11094             :                 }
   11095           0 :             }
   11096             : 
   11097           0 :             void printReconstructedExpression() const {
   11098           0 :                 if( result.hasExpandedExpression() ) {
   11099             :                     {
   11100           0 :                         Colour colour( dimColour() );
   11101           0 :                         stream << " for: ";
   11102             :                     }
   11103           0 :                     stream << result.getExpandedExpression();
   11104             :                 }
   11105           0 :             }
   11106             : 
   11107           0 :             void printMessage() {
   11108           0 :                 if ( itMessage != messages.end() ) {
   11109           0 :                     stream << " '" << itMessage->message << '\'';
   11110           0 :                     ++itMessage;
   11111             :                 }
   11112           0 :             }
   11113             : 
   11114           0 :             void printRemainingMessages( Colour::Code colour = dimColour() ) {
   11115           0 :                 if ( itMessage == messages.end() )
   11116           0 :                     return;
   11117             : 
   11118             :                 // using messages.end() directly yields compilation error:
   11119           0 :                 std::vector<MessageInfo>::const_iterator itEnd = messages.end();
   11120           0 :                 const std::size_t N = static_cast<std::size_t>( std::distance( itMessage, itEnd ) );
   11121             : 
   11122             :                 {
   11123           0 :                     Colour colourGuard( colour );
   11124           0 :                     stream << " with " << pluralise( N, "message" ) << ':';
   11125             :                 }
   11126             : 
   11127           0 :                 for(; itMessage != itEnd; ) {
   11128             :                     // If this assertion is a warning ignore any INFO messages
   11129           0 :                     if( printInfoMessages || itMessage->type != ResultWas::Info ) {
   11130           0 :                         stream << " '" << itMessage->message << '\'';
   11131           0 :                         if ( ++itMessage != itEnd ) {
   11132           0 :                             Colour colourGuard( dimColour() );
   11133           0 :                             stream << " and";
   11134             :                         }
   11135             :                     }
   11136             :                 }
   11137             :             }
   11138             : 
   11139             :         private:
   11140             :             std::ostream& stream;
   11141             :             AssertionStats const& stats;
   11142             :             AssertionResult const& result;
   11143             :             std::vector<MessageInfo> messages;
   11144             :             std::vector<MessageInfo>::const_iterator itMessage;
   11145             :             bool printInfoMessages;
   11146             :         };
   11147             : 
   11148             :         // Colour, message variants:
   11149             :         // - white: No tests ran.
   11150             :         // -   red: Failed [both/all] N test cases, failed [both/all] M assertions.
   11151             :         // - white: Passed [both/all] N test cases (no assertions).
   11152             :         // -   red: Failed N tests cases, failed M assertions.
   11153             :         // - green: Passed [both/all] N tests cases with M assertions.
   11154             : 
   11155           0 :         std::string bothOrAll( std::size_t count ) const {
   11156           0 :             return count == 1 ? std::string() : count == 2 ? "both " : "all " ;
   11157             :         }
   11158             : 
   11159           0 :         void printTotals( const Totals& totals ) const {
   11160           0 :             if( totals.testCases.total() == 0 ) {
   11161           0 :                 stream << "No tests ran.";
   11162             :             }
   11163           0 :             else if( totals.testCases.failed == totals.testCases.total() ) {
   11164           0 :                 Colour colour( Colour::ResultError );
   11165             :                 const std::string qualify_assertions_failed =
   11166           0 :                     totals.assertions.failed == totals.assertions.total() ?
   11167           0 :                         bothOrAll( totals.assertions.failed ) : std::string();
   11168           0 :                 stream <<
   11169           0 :                     "Failed " << bothOrAll( totals.testCases.failed )
   11170           0 :                               << pluralise( totals.testCases.failed, "test case"  ) << ", "
   11171           0 :                     "failed " << qualify_assertions_failed <<
   11172           0 :                                  pluralise( totals.assertions.failed, "assertion" ) << '.';
   11173             :             }
   11174           0 :             else if( totals.assertions.total() == 0 ) {
   11175           0 :                 stream <<
   11176           0 :                     "Passed " << bothOrAll( totals.testCases.total() )
   11177           0 :                               << pluralise( totals.testCases.total(), "test case" )
   11178           0 :                               << " (no assertions).";
   11179             :             }
   11180           0 :             else if( totals.assertions.failed ) {
   11181           0 :                 Colour colour( Colour::ResultError );
   11182           0 :                 stream <<
   11183           0 :                     "Failed " << pluralise( totals.testCases.failed, "test case"  ) << ", "
   11184           0 :                     "failed " << pluralise( totals.assertions.failed, "assertion" ) << '.';
   11185             :             }
   11186             :             else {
   11187           0 :                 Colour colour( Colour::ResultSuccess );
   11188           0 :                 stream <<
   11189           0 :                     "Passed " << bothOrAll( totals.testCases.passed )
   11190           0 :                               << pluralise( totals.testCases.passed, "test case"  ) <<
   11191           0 :                     " with "  << pluralise( totals.assertions.passed, "assertion" ) << '.';
   11192             :             }
   11193           0 :         }
   11194             :     };
   11195             : 
   11196           1 :     INTERNAL_CATCH_REGISTER_REPORTER( "compact", CompactReporter )
   11197             : 
   11198             : } // end namespace Catch
   11199             :

   11454             : #endif
   11455             : 
   11456             : #define CATCH_TRANSLATE_EXCEPTION( signature ) INTERNAL_CATCH_TRANSLATE_EXCEPTION( signature )
   11457             : 
   11458             : // "BDD-style" convenience wrappers
   11459             : #ifdef CATCH_CONFIG_VARIADIC_MACROS
   11460             : #define SCENARIO( ... ) TEST_CASE( "Scenario: " __VA_ARGS__ )
   11461             : #define SCENARIO_METHOD( className, ... ) INTERNAL_CATCH_TEST_CASE_METHOD( className, "Scenario: " __VA_ARGS__ )
   11462             : #else
   11463             : #define SCENARIO( name, tags ) TEST_CASE( "Scenario: " name, tags )
   11464             : #define SCENARIO_METHOD( className, name, tags ) INTERNAL_CATCH_TEST_CASE_METHOD( className, "Scenario: " name, tags )
   11465             : #endif
   11466             : #define GIVEN( desc )    SECTION( std::string("   Given: ") + desc, "" )
   11467             : #define WHEN( desc )     SECTION( std::string("    When: ") + desc, "" )
   11468             : #define AND_WHEN( desc ) SECTION( std::string("And when: ") + desc, "" )
   11469             : #define THEN( desc )     SECTION( std::string("    Then: ") + desc, "" )
   11470             : #define AND_THEN( desc ) SECTION( std::string("     And: ") + desc, "" )
   11471             : 
   11472           3 : using Catch::Detail::Approx;
   11473             : 
   11474             : #endif // TWOBLUECUBES_SINGLE_INCLUDE_CATCH_HPP_INCLUDED
